DocAttribute.Name: ConnectionGeometry
DocAttribute.Documentation: Relationship to the control class, that provides the geometrical constraints of the connection.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatingElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to an Element that is connected by the objectified relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: RelatedElement
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to an Element that is connected by the objectified relationship.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR31
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The instance of the relating element shall not be the same instance as the related element.
